Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Celestial! I am back with the tear of Mr. Big Fish!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "It's good that you got the tear. But why did you also bring back so many toys and snacks... gulp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Um... Because I met Mr. Guide at the bottom of the mountain. I mean, he used to be a tour guide, but is running a shop now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'He just had to give me them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'I see. Not bad... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Without further ado, let's start making the elixir!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Strychnine, senna, cocklebur and lotus seeds.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Dioscorea, sophora, chinaberry...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Is this a spell for making the elixir? It sounds like a song.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Not much different... gulp.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Finally, tear of Big Fish... Ready!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{3: 'The celestial makes a finger snap. The pot cooking the elixir suddenly shines brilliantly, shooting all the way to the clouds. The light lasts a few seconds before disappearing.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Tsk, I knew I shouldn't trust the specials. This torch only lasted a few seconds.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Is this small black ball... the elixir?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: 'Correct. It may not taste good, but it can heal any disease.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Phew... Finally, I can cure Master's disease.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Yeah. Maybe this is fate's reward for your hard work.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celestial!', 3: "Now, it's time for those who travel far away from home to come back.", 4: '2'}
